content: --स्थः {1} the Supreme being. {2} the writer-caste (proceeding from a क्षत्रिय father and a शूद्र mother). {3} a man of that caste; कायस्थ इति लघ्वी मात्रा <ls>Mu. 1</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 336</ls>; <ls>Mk. 9.</ls> (--स्था {1} a woman of that caste. {2} the Myrobalan tree. (--स्थी the wife of a कायस्थ.
